title.en: Prayer to the Successive Lives of the Great Trulshik 'Destroyer of Delusion'

text.en: In Aṭakāvatī, you were the mighty Lord of Secrets,
text.en-trans: changlo chen du tutob sangwé dak

text.en: During the Buddha's time, you were his attendant Ānanda;
In Songtsen Gampo's day, you were the Dharma minister Gar Tongtsen;
text.en-trans: song tsen dü su chölön gar tong tsen

text.en: In Padmasambhava's time, you were Vairotsana;
text.en-trans: orgyen dü su bai ro tsa na dang

text.en: And, to tame the wicked king, Lhalung Palgyi Dorje;
text.en-trans: dik gyal dul chir lha lung pal dorjé

text.en: During Milarepa's time, you were Rechung Dorje Drak;
text.en-trans: mi lé dü su ré chung dorjé drak

text.en: And you were Lekyi Dorje, who held Vajrapāṇi's transmission;
text.en-trans: sangdak kabab lé kyi dorjé zhab

text.en: You were Melong Dorje of Lhodrak Kharchu,
text.en-trans: lho drak kharchur melong dorjé dang

text.en: And in the hermitage of Shade'u, Trulshik Kunsö—
text.en-trans: wenné zha dé'ur trulzhik kün sö sok

text.en: Embodiment of them all, lord of the maṇḍala, who renounced ordinary activity,
Kunzang Tongdrol Dorje, to you I pray!
